about_the_game:
Made with passion by a one man dev team:

This is the demo to Hellbreach: Vegas, a wave-based demon shooter, made by Ash, the one-man army behind Infinity Ape Studios. Play as a solo survivor or a team of up to four and face a demonic threat. Set new records as you shoot your way through waves of demons in the neon-lit streets of Las Vegas.

  • The demo has 1 game mode: Survive.

  • 1 map

  • 18 guns

  • 3 melee weapons

  • 11 perks

  • 5 slot machines

  • 9 enemy types

  • The full game has 4 game modes: Survive, Trapped, Gun Pro, and Royale

  • 7 maps

  • 18 guns

  • 3 melee weapons

  • 11 perks

  • 5 slot machines

  • 9 enemy types

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains themes and content of an adult nature due to graphic violence and horror that may not suitable for minors. This includes the use of guns to shoot and inevitably kill demons and demon like creatures. This game may also not be suitable for people who are sensitive to loud noises, flashes or horror images.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Core i5-4570 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 570 equivalent DX11 GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 5700 equivalent DX11 GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Hellbreach: Vegas is a Wave-based First-Person Shooter for 1-4 players, made with passion by a one man dev team! Set your loadout, kill, and earn cash. Take a spin on the various slot machines and level up to improve your survival chances. Are you ready to try your luck?
